meanings.definition: The officials or people in positions of authority within a government or organization.
meanings.sent1: The officialdoms were busy preparing for the upcoming election.
meanings.sent2: The officialdoms issued a statement regarding the new policy changes.
meanings.sent3: The officialdoms had a meeting to discuss the color of the new uniforms.
meanings.sent4: The officialdoms' decisions trickled down to affect the entire organization.
meanings.sent5: The officialdoms' power was evident in their ability to make important decisions.

meanings.definition: The system or culture of official authority and bureaucracy.
meanings.sent1: The officialdoms of the company were known for their strict rules and regulations.
meanings.sent2: Navigating through the officialdoms of the government can be quite challenging.
meanings.sent3: The officialdoms' paperwork seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent4: The officialdoms' red tape slowed down the progress of the project.
meanings.sent5: The officialdoms' hierarchy was clearly defined within the organization.
